title: IRL Questions: Shaving.
body:
Now, i know This isnt exactly EVERYONES Best subject...

But honestly, Is there any Shaving tips?

I mean, I'll be Honest, I'm a fucking Neck-Monkey that has to shave every 5 days or i'll have a Neck-beard Game stronger than Kim-Kardashians Ass Game..

And i'll get Nicks A LOT.

So, My obvious question, Is how can i Incorporate Shaving into a Routine, Without having it take half an hour to just Shave.

Also, Should i Invest in an Electric Shaver/Groomer? I know thats one of those things you have to use every other day or else it wont work, But should I Think about it?
